trends: There has been one other sighting in Gulfport
There were no other sightings in Gulfport on or around September 21st 1975
Summary: Saw gray cigar shaped UFO being chased by 2 military jets.
divs: sighting detailsi was riding my bike down a street heading west in the town of gulfport fla.. the weather was clear and there was a large portion of open sky in front of me ,and a row of trees on my left. i saw a large cigar shaped object possibly 2 1\2 times the length of a fighter jet and maybe 20 ft tall fly over from north to south at about 200\300 miles an hour it was gray\silver in color and i dont know if it had any markings on it . it was followed by 2 military fighter jets that from what i remember were right behind it.maybe 50 ft.behind .i only saw this for a couple of seconds as they passed maybe an eighth of a mile in front of me,and almost directly overhead.the only sound i remember is the sound of the jet engines.this all happened so quickly i just brushed it off as military vehicles,maybe experimental.mcdill air force base is not far from where i lived.
